title: Giselle
creator_credit: ABC-TV (Australia), Maina Gielgud and Geoffrey Nottage
brief_description: The story of Giselle is a romantic tale of innocent love and betrayal, of Prince Albrecht and a trusting peasant maid, Giselle. This beautiful production of this classic ballet is directed by Maina Gielgud, Artistic Director of the Australian Ballet.
description: The story of Giselle is a romantic tale of innocent love and betrayal, of Prince Albrecht and a trusting peasant maid, Giselle. This beautiful production of this classic ballet is directed by Maina Gielgud, Artistic Director of the Australian Ballet.
